children.name: üéØ Features
children.description: Documentation and assessment of all TreeListy capabilities. Each feature area contains Current state, honest Assessment, and specific Improvements.

children.name: Views
children.description: TreeListy's 5 visualization modes: Tree, Canvas, 3D, Gantt, and Calendar.

children.name: Current
children.description:
**Tree View**: Classic outliner with expand/collapse, drag-drop reordering, keyboard navigation (j/k/h/l), inline editing.

**Canvas View**: GoJS-powered 2D visualization with draggable nodes, dependency lines, minimap, zoom/pan.

**3D View**: Three.js WebGL renderer showing tree as 3D structure with orbit controls.

**Gantt View**: Frappe Gantt integration for timeline visualization with critical path highlighting.

**Calendar View**: Monthly calendar grid for date-based items.

children.name: Assessment
children.description:
**Strengths**: View diversity is a major differentiator. Canvas view dependency visualization is powerful. Gantt integration is production-quality.

**Weaknesses**: 3D view is more novelty than utility. Canvas performance degrades with >200 nodes. Calendar view lacks week/day views.

children.name: Improvements
children.description:
1. Add virtual scrolling to Tree view
2. Improve Canvas performance
3. Add week/day views to Calendar
4. Rethink 3D view purpose
5. Add view transition animations
6. Add view recommendation
7. Keyboard shortcuts for views

children.description: 21 domain-specific schemas that transform generic trees into specialized tools.

children.name: Current
children.description: 21 Patterns Available with Pattern Translation Engine that preserves shadow data.

children.name: Assessment
children.description: Pattern selection is overwhelming. Many patterns underutilized. No custom pattern creation.

children.name: Improvements
children.description: Add pattern wizard. Create custom pattern builder. Show shadow data indicator.

children.name: Assessment

children.name: Improvements
children.description: Add response streaming. Unify API key management. Add MCP Bridge setup wizard.

children.name: Collaboration

children.name: Current

children.name: Assessment
children.description: Live sync works but no conflict resolution. No permission levels.

children.name: Improvements

children.name: Data Management
children.description: Import/Export, 50-state undo, LocalStorage auto-save.

children.name: Current
children.description: Import: JSON, Excel, MS Project, PDF, Text, Voice. Export: JSON only.

children.name: Assessment
children.description: Import variety excellent. Export options limited. Single-tree storage.

children.name: Improvements
children.description: Add export formats. Implement IndexedDB. Add multi-tree management.

children.name: Mobile/PWA
children.description: Progressive Web App with single-pane navigation and touch gestures.

children.name: Current
children.description: Installable PWA. All 5 views work on mobile. Touch optimization.

children.name: Assessment
children.description: True PWA is rare. Performance suffers on older phones. iOS session issues.

children.name: Improvements
children.description: Add gesture tutorial. Fix iOS session persistence. Reduce bundle size.

children.name: üèóÔ∏è Architecture
children.description: Technical documentation of how TreeListy is built.

children.name: Single-File Structure
children.description: ~1.3MB HTML file containing all HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

children.name: Current
children.description: Lines 1-2000: HTML. Lines 2000-10000: CSS. Lines 10000-70000+: JavaScript.

children.name: Assessment
children.description: Zero build complexity. 1.3MB impacts load time. IDE struggles with 70000+ lines.

children.name: Improvements
children.description: Add code splitting. Add TypeScript via JSDoc. Minify for production.

children.name: Core Data Model
children.description: capexTree object structure, node schema, hyperedges.

children.name: Current
children.description: JSON-serializable tree. 4-level hierarchy. Hyperedges for cross-cutting relationships.

children.name: Assessment
children.description: Simple structure. 4-level limit is artificial. No schema validation.

children.name: Improvements
children.description: Remove 4-level limit. Add schema validation. Use UUIDs for node IDs.

children.name: Rendering Pipeline
children.description: Five render functions for each view.

children.name: Current
children.description: render(), renderCanvas(), render3D(), renderGantt(), renderCalendar().

children.name: Assessment
children.description: Full re-render on every change. renderCanvas() is 800+ lines. No virtualization.

children.name: Improvements
children.description: Implement virtual scrolling. Add render diffing. Batch renders.

children.name: State Management
children.description: Global variables, saveState() for undo.

children.name: Current
children.description: Global state variables. 50-state undo stack. LocalStorage persistence.

children.name: Assessment
children.description: Simple mental model. Global state is unpredictable. Race conditions possible.

children.name: Improvements
children.description: Implement reactive state. Add state schema. Use Immer.

children.name: External Integrations
children.description: Netlify, Firebase, MCP Bridge, CDN libraries.

children.name: Current
children.description: Netlify Functions for API proxy. Firebase for sync. MCP Bridge for Claude Code.

children.name: Assessment
children.description: Netlify cold starts add latency. Firebase rules permissive. CDN dependency.

children.name: Improvements
children.description: Add rate limiting. Improve Firebase security. Bundle critical libraries.

children.name: Build & Deploy
children.description: GitHub, Netlify auto-deploy, manual versioning.

children.name: Current
children.description: Push to main triggers deploy. Version in 4 locations. 385+ unit tests.

children.name: Assessment
children.description: Instant deploy. Manual version bumping error-prone. No CI/CD.

children.name: Improvements
children.description: Automate version bumping. Add GitHub Actions CI. Enable branch protection.
